article_node.title: Columbia Banking System to Present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
article_node.summary: Columbia Banking System, Inc. will present at the Barclays 23rd Annual Global Financial Services Conference on September 10, 2025, at 11:15 a.m. ET. The presentation will be available via a live audiocast on their investor relations website. Columbia, headquartered in Tacoma, Washington, is the parent company of Columbia Bank, a major regional bank in the western U.S. with over $50 billion in assets, offering a range of banking and wealth management services.
